Description: This place is  a great place to be, a minute is so great more an hour else where

I have taken you so small in my eyes, Oh Lord, forgive me and I have believe in my eyes that you where unable to help me, Oh Lord I see my wrong and I ask that you show yourself strong and in my heart and with my song Oh Lord be magnified, Oh Lord be magnified

There is longing only you can fill, a ranging tempest only you can still, my soul is thirsty lord to know you as i know. Drink from the river that flows before your throne. Take me deeper, deeper in love with you, Jesus hold me close in your embrace
